name: Eyedventure
description:
Introduction

Hey! This is an early demo build of my short game "Eyedventure".  The majority of the content was made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. I hope you will like it!

Before I take the development forward, I would like to gather your feedback!

Story

You've been locked between dimensions for someone else's crimes. Once in a million years, you can join a series of dangerous trails in exchange for redemption. One more time you could feel, that YOU'RE NOT ALONE.
